name: Circle Rusher
description:
Circle Rusher it's simple and challenging! Impossible reach score 10!

Accelerate or slow down your speed and test your skills!

How to Play:

. You are the blue ball rushing in a circle track!

. To control the speed press 'A' to accelerate or 'S' to slow down.

. Avoid collision with enemies

. Complete the lap to score

. Watch out! Every 5 points a new enemy appears to make you life harder!

This is the second game of my personal challenge 'A Game A Week', week 41 of 2016. Don't forget to visit the week 40 game, Hextricks!

What's you best score?

Anything to say or any suggestion?

Please answer at the commentary bellow.

Thank you!
